name: A Game A Week - Week 1 - Rat Garden
name_original: A Game A Week - Week 1 - Rat Garden
description:
Every week I'm making and releasing a small game. I start on Thursday after midnight and have to have it uploaded by wednesday midnight the next week no matter the state of the game. 

This week i made a multiplayer rat squishing boulder garden. Squash the most rats in a round to get the rat squishing crown!
